title: I've received phone as a present and after one month of usage it turned off and now I can't start it
content:
Hi there.
Phone was a present and it is really good phone as a replacement for my old and good Nexus 6.
I've used it one month and unexpectedly my Pixel 3 turned off.
At the moment I'm unable to turnit on, it doesn't respond on a power button and on Power+ Vol Down combination.
When I connect it to its original charger there are no signs on the screen.
